review: As much as the game looks awesome, nut it isnt because there is so much bugs and stuff. For example, sometimes i shoot a NPC it took a bit of time before it actually deals damage to it, and hackers srsly? they shredded our health withing a few seconds. Mainly after completing the main story is all about the DZ full of griefers. so if anyone is reading this thing pls do not buy this darn game!
the game is good only hating some enemies like tasers and cloakers

The game is a bit hard for start up and the credits earn each round is so less can't even have a proper start up plus so less maps to play in ,not just only me people will get bored too plus the mercs price is expensive so if u want my support pls lower the price!
its a fun game although its lag for me but ye still awesome but can u made like country own servers so that it wont be so lag!!!!
the game is nice but i prefer it giving a weapon a certain speed
valve pls put this game on mac
valve this game is awesome!!! pls keep up with the updates
